name: Andrélon Shampoo zomerblond
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Mica, Gluconolactone, Maltodextrin, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Sodium Sulfate, Trehalose, Honey (Honing) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower (Kamille) Extract, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, CI 15985, CI 19140, CI 77891.
